===================
Operator precedence
===================

func x() {
  a = a == a < a > a <= a >= a + a - a * a / a % a;
}

-------------------

(program
	(function_definition
		name: (identifier)
		body: (statement_list
			(expression_statement
				(binary_expression
					left: (identifier)
					right: (binary_expression
						left: (identifier)
						right: (binary_expression
							left: (identifier)
							right: (binary_expression
								left: (identifier)
								right: (binary_expression
									left: (identifier)
									right: (binary_expression
										left: (identifier)
										right: (binary_expression
											left: (identifier)
											right: (binary_expression
												left: (identifier)
												right: (binary_expression
													left: (identifier)
													right: (binary_expression
														left: (identifier)
														right: (binary_expression
															left: (identifier)
															right: (identifier))))))))))))))))
